Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Renal cell carcinoma - Sporadic - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database.
